<a href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/07/how-to-use-chatgpt-for-data-science.html# more">;要阅读本文全文，请点击此处</a>;<div>;这篇文章首先出现在 <a href="https://www.listendata.com/">;ListenData</a>;</div >;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-28:/26db6bf57749e51aedaf592af6f29221fffca7cd067a15e20ccc7e8979dc79a9</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;PyCon US 2023 - An充满动感的一周</stitle>;<updated>;2023-06-28T00:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Quansight Labs</name>;<uri>;https://labs.quansight.org</ uri>;</author>;<link href="https://labs.quansight.org/blog/pycon-us-2023-an-action-packed-week"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang= "en">;在这篇文章中，我将分享我前往美国参加 PyCon US 2023 的经历</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-27： /6788574ccd719410519757cdd2e28bae6e1ee645b212ab0427a0f6be5de7e154</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;如何使用 SHAP 值优化和调试 ML 模型</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06-27T14:22:37Z</更新>;<作者>; <名称>;neptune.ai</名称>;<uri>;https://neptune.ai/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://neptune.ai/blog/shap-v​​alues"/>; <content type="html" xml:lang="en">;想象一下，您已经投入了无数的时间来训练和微调您的模型，并仔细分析大量的数据。然而，您对影响其预测的因素缺乏清晰的了解，因此很难进一步改进它。 如果您曾经遇到过这种情况，请尝试理解…</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-27:/78c78f2d574418eae2a6c9fbc9e3fa11cb1c62f34d8b9972a15e91fe2c2eed1a< /id>;<title xml:lang="en">;2023 年 MLOps 格局：顶级工具和平台</stitle>;<updated>;2023-06-27T09:36:21Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;neptune。 ai</name>;<uri>;https://neptune.ai/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://neptune.ai/blog/mlops-tools-platforms-landscape"/>;< content type="html" xml:lang="en">;当您深入研究 2023 年 MLOps 的前景时，您会发现大量工具和平台已获得关注，并正在塑造模型开发、部署和部署的方式被监控。为了向您提供全面的概述，本文探讨了 MLOps 和 FMOps（或 LLMOps）生态系统中的关键参与者，…</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org ,2023-06-27:/a0a789190f750eda97c9f99b2692935693522bf74388ac5ca861879047eb6694</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Numba 动态异常</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06-27T00:00:00Z</已更新>;<作者>;<名称>;Quansight 实验室</名称>;<uri>;https://labs.quansight.org</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://labs.quansight.org/blog/numba-dynamic-exceptions "/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;在下面的博文中，我们将探讨 Numba 中新添加的功能：动态异常支持。我们将讨论之前的限制，并解释如何增强 Numba 来处理运行时异常。</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-19:/1e052829c8dd5da418ac5d186d03be65f17e8efd2908a197a7873265ec6b76a7</id >;<title xml:lang="en">;如何在 Python 中构建 ChatGPT 克隆</stitle>;<updated>;2023-06-19T14:32:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;< uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/06/how-to-build- chatgpt-clone-in-python.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;在本文中，我们将了解构建聊天应用程序和应答机器人所涉及的步骤使用 ChatGPT API 和 gradio 的 Python。</p>; <p>;使用 Python 开发聊天应用程序可以为 ChatGPT 网站提供更多控制和灵活性。您可以根据需要自定义和扩展聊天应用程序。它还可以帮助您与现有系统和其他 API 集成。</p>; <div>;<a href="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiAjEnDuNChoaLsSFsPiRyfCY0oj33oauuNO4d8Vr7JeD1Xs8kkigOtFLV4S4Jdg-ftK9JDU7ugSmfdNcbd 8ujI2P6DEbgidggkZugGVMd1YQR_g2WggAJRd2zcrfwNj5YuKZDoLRprW-9PJqdtucph-v4dvlPE6IVX88QnthESRlxRF4RnEEYnFeT- XBaE/s1600/chatgpt%20clone%20OVERVIEW.png">;<img>;</a>;</div>; Langevin 算法是一种简单而强大的概率分布采样方法。它是一些机器学习方法（例如扩散模型和差分隐私学习）的关键要素。在这篇文章中，我将在以下特殊情况下对该方法进行简单的收敛分析：...</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023- 06-08:/00ecc20b52cc75fb3f8237abed36c290d2ab99b498860116de11f414377a3509</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Spyder gets CZI grant to add remote development features, and a new job opening!</stitle>;<updated>;2023-06-08T00:00 :00Z</updated>;<作者>;<名称>;Spyder 博客</名称>;<uri>;https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https: //www.spyder-ide.org/blog/czi-grant/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;在过去几年中，Spyder 将自己定位为流行的数据科学 IDE 将交互式计算和易用性与强大的编程工具相结合。然而，与其他一些 IDE 相比，有限的远程开发支持阻碍了采用，因为许多用户希望在个人计算机上进行开发时，在高性能计算 (HPC) 集群或 AWS、GCP 或 DigitalOcean 等云提供商上处理数据和代码。添加这些功能将使科学界能够从其本地开发环境的简便性和效率来处理数据和计算密集型编程任务，从而开辟许多新的研究可能性。感谢 <a href="https://chanzuckerberg.com/">;Chan Zuckerberg Initiative</a>; 的两年资助，我们现在能够解决这个缺陷。</p>; <p>;对现在，用户有两个主要选项可以使用本地 IDE 进行远程工作（除了纯粹基于 Web 浏览器的方法，这种方法有时不可用或不理想）： 他们可以在终端中编辑和执行文件，这不是< /p>; <a href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/czi-grant/">;（续...）</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;< id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-06:/59f44f95949a93840e187c6ebe68378ab4a1d7eef036504393e6269eb5e32416</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;如何构建机器学习模型训练管道</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06 - 06T12:40:58Z</更新>;<作者>;<名称>;neptune.ai</名称>;<uri>;https://neptune.ai/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https:// neptune.ai/blog/building-ml-model-training-pipeline"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;如果您曾经花费数小时来整理凌乱的脚本或感觉像你一边在寻找幽灵，一边试图修复那个难以捉摸的错误，而你的模型却要花很长时间来训练。我们都经历过这样的情况，对吧？但现在，想象一个不同的场景：干净的代码。简化的工作流程。高效的模型训练。太好了…</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-06-06:/73f4ae1d736e2ece8bcb59018e7c98dc8db44ddab65d94cab895a4638e91ff10</id>;<title xml:lang="en" >;变形金刚代理：自动化一切的人工智能工具</stitle>;<更新>;2023-06-06T11:57:00Z</更新>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata .com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/06/transformers-agent.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;我们在市场上推出了一款名为 <code>;Transformers Agent</code>; 的新 AI 工具，它功能非常强大，几乎可以自动执行您能想到的任何任务。它可以生成和编辑图像、视频、音频、回答有关文档的问题、将语音转换为文本以及执行许多其他操作。</p>; <p>;<b>;Hugging Face</b>;，一个众所周知的名字在开源人工智能领域，发布了 Transformers Agent，它在 Transformers 之上提供了自然语言 API。 API 设计为易于使用。通过一行代码，它提供了执行自然语言任务的多种工具，例如问答、图像生成、视频生成、文本转语音、文本分类和摘要。</p>; <p>;Facebook 所属公司 Meta 发布了一种名为<b>;大规模多语言语音 (MMS)</b>; 的新 AI 模型，可以将 1,100 多种语言的文本转换为语音，以及将语音转换为文本。它是免费提供的。它不仅可以帮助世界各地的院士和研究人员，还可以帮助语言保护主义者或活动家记录和保护濒临灭绝的语言，以防止其灭绝。</p>; <p>;MMS 接受了超过 1,100 种语言的大型文本和音频数据集的训练。 。该模型的另一个最好的部分是它生成的音频听起来非常自然，就像人类的语音一样。它还能够识别 4,000 多种口语。</p>; <img>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/05/massively-multilingual-speech.html#more">; read this article in full, please click here</a>;<div>;This post appeared first on <a href="https://www.listendata.com/">;ListenData</a>;</div>;</content >;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-05-04:/570f9788c4e83459d47b9a20bb348c0887ee1cfdbe4c9d1d802d75a95d6e48e9</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;PyQt6 Book now available in Korean: 파이썬과 Qt6로 GUI 애플리케이션 만들기 — The hands-on guide to creating GUI applications with Python gets a new translation</stitle>;<updated>;2023-05-04T09:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Martin Fitzpatrick - python</name>;<uri>;https://blog.martinfitzpatrick.com/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://blog.martinfitzpatrick.com/pyqt6-book-now-available-in -korean/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;I am very happy to announce that my Python GUI programming book <strong>;Create GUI Applications with Python & Qt6 / PyQt6 Edition …</strong>;</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-04-19:/8c6fb5afb0edc2190711565ab3b0d8fa1a23d07f9fd4c931c2d1f6dd1cedca35</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;AutoGPT : Everything You Need To Know</stitle>;<updated>;2023-04-19T12:32:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/04/autogpt-explained-everything-you-need.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;In this post we have covered AutoGPT in detail. By end of this tutorial, you will not only understand how it works but also will be able to run it on your system. Auto-GPT has gained a significant amount of popularity in the media. It has become one of the most talked-about topics across various social media platforms after <code>;ChatGPT</code>;. It has not only captured the attention of people in Artifical Intelligence community but also people from other background. Media outlets across countries covered it and reported how it can automate everything ranging from simple to complex tasks.</p>; <img>; <div>;<span>;Table of Contents</span>;</div>; <hr>; <div>; What is AutoGPT? <p>;AutoGPT is an experimental open-source project built on the latest ChatGPT model ie GPT-4. It is not limited to ChatGPT as it can also do web search and try to find information from internet. When a client gives us a project with instructions on what to do. We, as analysts, perform tasks to fulfill the project requirements.</p>;</div>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/04/autogpt-explained-everything-you-need.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-04-09:/e8ed892fb56621353fa2fa2de5c47971aadb5cf91e73085fd178e4afd198a372</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Open Source GPT-4 Models Made Easy</stitle>;<updated>;2023-04-09T08:58:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/04/open-source-gpt-4-models-made-easy.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;In this post we will explain how Open Source GPT-4 Models work and how you can use them as an alternative to a commercial OpenAI GPT-4 solution. Everyday new open source large language models (LLMs) are emerging and the list gets bigger and bigger. We will cover these two models <code>;GPT-4 version of Alpaca</code>; and <code>;Vicuna</code>;. This tutorial includes the workings of the models, as well as their implementation with Python</p>; <div>;<span>;Table of Contents</span>;</div>; <hr>; <div>; Vicuna Model Introduction : Vicuna Model <p>;Vicuna was the first open-source model available publicly which is comparable to GPT-4 output. It was fine-tuned on Meta's LLaMA 13B model and conversations dataset collected from ShareGPT. ShareGPT is the website wherein people share their ChatGPT conversations with others.</p>; <blockquote>;<b>;Important Note :</b>; The Vicuna Model was primarily trained on the GPT-3.5 dataset because most of the conversations on ShareGPT during the model's development were based on GPT-3.5. But the model was evaluated based on</blockquote>;</div>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/04/open-source-gpt-4-models-made-easy.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-04-06:/162ff1c78e2f048e820f0a5b105f51da86c3e6e5e0ed3a4bac74e07c10d90634</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;snakemake for doing bioinformatics - inputs and outputs and more!</stitle>;<updated>;2023-04-06T22:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Living in an Ivory Basement</name>;<uri>;http://ivory.idyll.org/blog/</uri>;</author>;<link href="http://ivory.idyll.org/blog/2023-snakemake-slithering-input-outputs.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;Slithering your way into bioinformatics with snakemake - inputs and outputs and more!</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-03-30:/6449f5cf066741ac09328371745eb363ee2d2d9790a596911dea4e2dc769df48</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;15 Free Open Source ChatGPT Alternatives (with Code)</stitle>;<updated>;2023-03-30T08:01:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/03/open-source-chatgpt-models-step-by-step.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;In this article we will explain how Open Source ChatGPT alternatives work and how you can use them to build your own ChatGPT clone for free. By the end of this article you will have a good understanding of these models and will be able to compare and use them.</p>; <div>;Benefits of Open Source ChatGPT Alternatives</div>; <p>;There are various benefits of using open source large language models which are alternatives to ChatGPT. Some of them are listed below.</p>; <ol>; <li>;<b>;Data Privacy</b>;: Many companies want to have control over data. It is important for them as they don't want any third-party to have access to their data.</li>; <li>;<b>;Customization</b>;: It allows developers to train large language models with their own data and some filtering on some topics if they want to apply</li>; <li>;<b>;Affordability</b>;: Open source GPT models let you to train sophisticated large language models without worrying about expensive hardware.</li>; <li>;<b>;Democratizing AI</b>;: It opens room for further research which can be used for solving real-world problems.</li>; </ol>; <img>; <div>;<span>;Table of</span>;</div>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2023/03/open-source-chatgpt-models-step-by-step.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2023-03-20:/e4f6e14b79f5213f0d7a6f9cc8c87ffb92b9649a4693b92d14cf6bbe49d2c7dc</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Getting Started With Git and GitHub in Your Python Projects — Version-Controlling Your Python Projects With Git and GitHub</stitle>;<updated>;2023-03-20T06:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Martin Fitzpatrick - python</name>;<uri>;https://blog.martinfitzpatrick.com/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://blog.martinfitzpatrick.com/git-github-python/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;Using a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_control">;version control system (VCS)</a>; is crucial for any software development project. It has crossed one million users in just a week time. Those who haven't heard about ChatGPT, it's a large language model trained by OpenAI. In simple words, it's a chat bot which answers your questions and the responses it provides may sound human-like. It's an impressive machine learning solution. With the release of GPT-4 we can rely on it over Google search for learning on any topic.</p>; <span>; <b>;Update: </b>; I updated this article with reviews on GPT-4.</span>; <img>; <div>;Why ChatGPT-3.5 Isn't Smart enough, but GPT-4 is</div>; <p>;You can't trust <b>;ChatGPT-3.5</b>; for preparation on any certification or exam. It's a Big NO if you think you can refer ChatGPT-3.5 for answering questions in a telephonic interview round. Yes I know it's a cheating if you even use Google for the same but wanted to give a WARNING as many people do this and many social media influencers posted on how to leverage ChatGPT-3.5 for cracking</p>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/12/limitations-of-ChatGPT.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-12-05:/2f43f11693ce704ba22f891bf56ef14440b1c47ac886e5390664f616484f8470</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Conda on Colaboratory</stitle>;<updated>;2022-12-05T00:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Quansight Labs</name>;<uri>;https://labs.quansight.org</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://labs.quansight.org/blog/conda-on-colaboratory"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;Surbhi Sharma shares her exciting experience working as an intern at Quansight Labs and contributing to condacolab, a tool that lets you deploy a Miniconda installation easily on Google Colab notebooks. This enables you to use conda or mamba to install new packages on any Colab session.</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-11-30:/915a3134e91c66f86f73339569eff4a5c7674bfd0d0d2e8a9db8c66964ae38da</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Improvements to the Spyder IDE installation experience</stitle>;<updated>;2022-11-30T00:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Spyder Blog</name>;<uri>;https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/installer-improvements/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;<em>;<a href="https://github.com/jsbautista">;Juan Sebastian Bautista</a>;, <a href="https://github.com/CAM-Gerlach">;CAM Gerlach</a>; and <a href="https://github.com/ccordoba12">;Carlos Cordoba</a>; also contributed to this post.</em>;</p>; <p>;<a href="https://github.com/spyder-ide/spyder/releases/tag/v5.4.0">;Spyder 5.4.0</a>; was released recently, featuring some major enhancements to its Windows and macOS standalone installers. You'll now get more detailed feedback when new versions are available, and you can download and start the update to them from right within Spyder, instead of having to install them manually. In this post, we'll go over how these new update features work and how you can start using them!</p>; <p>;Before proceeding, we want to acknowledge that this work was made possible by <a href="https://github.com/spyder-ide/spyder/wiki/NumFOCUS-Small-Development-Grant-2022">;a Small Development Grant</a>; awarded to Spyder by <a href="https://numfocus.org/">;NumFOCUS</a>;, which has enabled us to hire a new developer (<a href="https://github.com/jsbautista">;Juan Sebastian Bautista Rojas</a>;) to be in charge of all the implementation details.</p>; <p>;Before these improvements, Spyder already had a mechanism to detect more recent versions, but that functionality was very simple. There was a pop-up dialog warning that a new version was available, but users had to</p>; <a href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/installer-improvements/">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-11-30:/fdcc847f1a55fc12522b2bdfedc677cd70dae35b27c45b7512a2ce075a870b59</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Interview with Meekail Zain, scikit-learn Team Member</stitle>;<updated>;2022-11-30T00:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;scikit-learn Blog</name>;<uri>;https://blog.scikit-learn.org/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://blog.scikit-learn.org/team/meekail-zain-interview/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;Author: Reshama Shaikh , Meekail zain</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-11-28:/3178d5e74c801b5174d70a1887485ebbb18d7bbd30fb4bef2c6c3720fd180830</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Zoom zoom zoom! Improving Accessibility in JupyterLab</stitle>;<updated>;2022-11-28T00:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Quansight Labs</name>;<uri>;https://labs.quansight.org</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://labs.quansight.org/blog/zoom-a11y-jupyterlab"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;Kulsoom Zahra learns about accessibility and fixes a part of the JupyterLab interface (that used to break when zoomed in) during her summer 2022 internship at Quansight Labs.</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-11-18:/ff7c1de8f1bfcb1a5093bb16589ba4f7cdc1ff92210dd02758242b1626a09305</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Introducing the Spyder-Watchlist plugin</stitle>;<updated>;2022-11-18T12:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Spyder Blog</name>;<uri>;https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/introducing-watchlist-plugin/"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;Spyder's Variable Explorer is a great tool which aids the development and debugging of Python code by displaying all variables from the current scope. One thing the Variable Explorer is missing is the ability to display the value of arbitrary, user-definable expressions while debugging. For example, it might be useful to see the value of a specific attribute of an object, or the value of an array at some index. Such a feature is known as a "watchlist" or "watches" in other Integrated Development Environments (IDEs). This blog post introduces the Watchlist plugin developed for Spyder.</p>; Features <p>;The watchlist consists of a user-definable list of expressions. They are evaluated after each debugger step, and the result of the evaluation is displayed as a string. This means that <code>;value = str(eval(expression))</code>; is performed behind the scenes, and the result is shown in the plugin. The watchlist is a very powerful tool, but this comes at a cost: Any side effect of an expression will affect the execution environment.</p>; <p>;Expressions can be</p>; <a href="https://www.spyder-ide.org/blog/introducing-watchlist-plugin/">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-11-15:/9c3638146ce40c9a2b94d97467a99be9d4906466993b23e61630e468b59cd9f0</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Por que abandonamos os blogs?</stitle>;<updated>;2022-11-15T02:42:48Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Filipe Saraiva's blog</name>;<uri>;https://blog.filipesaraiva.info</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://blog.filipesaraiva.info/?p=2274"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;Interface de escrita do Twitter Estamos nesses dias assistindo o Elon Musk destruir o Twitter. Effects of Air Pollution is devastating and its harmful effects are not just limited to Humans but also animals and plants as well. It also leads to global warming which is esentially increasing air and ocean temperatures around the world.</p>; <p>;Indian cities have been topping the list of polluted cities. In order to solve the problem of air pollution the most important thing is to track air pollution on real-time basis first which alerts people to avoid outdoor activities during high air Pollution. This post explains how you can fetch real-time Air Quality Index (AQI) of Indian cities using Python and R code. It allows both Python and R programmers to pull pollution data.</p>; <img>; <p>;You can download the <a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/deepanshu88/Datasets/master/UploadedFiles/stations.csv">;dataset</a>; which contains static information about Indian states, cities and AQI stations. Variables stored in this dataset will be used further to fetch real-time data. </p>; <pre>;<code>; </code>;</pre>; <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/07/pollution-in-india-real-time-aqi-data.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-07-09:/a7a6ffb5ae09288dc19e59c97ce35ee0bccfa35252ca675a7dfe6955e9dec713</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;My Mayavi story: discovering open source communities</stitle>;<updated>;2022-07-09T22:00:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;Gaël Varoquaux - programming</name>;<uri>;https://gael-varoquaux.info/</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://gael-varoquaux.info/programming/my-mayavi-story-discovering-open-source-communities.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;<em>;The Mayavi Python software, and my personal history: A thread on Python and scipy ecosystems, building open source codebase, and meeting really cool and friendly people</em>;</p>; <img>; <p>;I am writing today as a goodbye to the project: I used to be one of the core contributors and maintainers but have been …</p>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-06-30:/6e74c86ed8127e22594e4ebfa1af7623d58f5792b9c48a86fc26a46029725e61</id>;<title xml:lang="en">;Pointwise mutual information (PMI) in NLP</stitle>;<updated>;2022-06-30T14:04:00Z</updated>;<author>;<name>;ListenData</name>;<uri>;https://www.listendata.com/search/label/Python</uri>;</author>;<link href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/06/pointwise-mutual-information-pmi.html"/>;<content type="html" xml:lang="en">;<p>;Natural Language Processing (NLP) has secured so much acceptance recently as there are many live projects running and now it's not just limited to academics only. Use cases of NLP can be seen across industries like understanding customers' issues, predicting the next word user is planning to type in the keyboard, automatic text summarization etc. Many researchers across the world trained NLP models in several human languages like English, Spanish, French, Mandarin etc so that benefit of NLP can be seen in every society. In this post we will talk about one of the most useful NLP metric called Pointwise mutual information (PMI) to identify words that can go together along with its implementation in Python and R.</p>; <div>; <span>;<b>;Table of Contents</b>;</span>; </div>; <hr>; <div>; What is Pointwise mutual information? <p>;PMI helps us to find related words. In other words, it explains how likely the co-occurrence of two words than we would expect by chance. Numpy also bring efficiency in Python programming. While using numpy you may encounter this error <code>;<b>;TypeError: only size-1 arrays can be converted to Python scalars</b>;</code>; It is one of the frequently appearing error and sometimes it becomes a daunting challenge to solve it. <div>;<a href="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjK6v1uF56-eE2H3W9kCqAfvA_AnTjFSwQMUAAmeSl6wGNf1B93d0t7hYGyjPVzWXwBhawVc3ybXCkGvrVvaXEDYSUKM5tevLPkCTu-Bof0y5BtM-b_QG6BXm3r0tg854h8dfur3ExNNbm87oh4rJdAh93cFPLt5-WtvVrgsckYJFo84axC_9HWdE6xKw/s1600/pyerror.PNG">;<img>;</a>;</div>; Meaning : Only Size 1 Arrays Can Be Converted To Python Scalars Error This error generally appears when Python expects a single value but you passed an array which consists of multiple values. For example : you want to calculate exponential value of an array but the function for exponential value was designed for scalar variable (which means single value). When you pass numpy array in the function, it will return this error. This error handling is to prevent your code to process further and avoids unexpected output from the <a href="https://www.listendata.com/2022/05/only-size-1-arrays-can-be-converted-to-python-scalars.html">;(continued...)</a>;</content>;</entry>;<entry>;<id>;tag:planet.scipy.org,2022-05-04:/d3640953c2d636b467deca8bd29431a25067e36eb1f95f7bf7a380a0bd0690f4</id>;<title
